message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the product for $18,000. I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a high-value item at a competitive price. Let me know if you're interested!
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but $18,000 is a bit too high for me. Would you consider $10,000?
Hi Bob, I understand you're looking for a better price, but $10,000 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $16,000. Let me know if that works for you!
Hi Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway. While $16,000 is closer, I'm aiming for something nearer to $11,000. Would you be willing to come down a bit more?

Hi Bob, I understand you're still looking for a better price, but I'm getting closer to my minimum price. I'm willing to compromise, so I'm counteroffering at $14,000. This is as low as I can go, so let me know if it works for you!
